gen:ReportedAttribute.com:Text: Goal 11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

11.b By 2020, significantly increase the number of cities and human settlements that adopt and implement integrated policies and action plans for the inclusion of all and the rational use of resources climate change adaptation and mitigation and disaster resilience, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction (2015-2030), comprehensive management disaster risk at all levels
11.b.2 Proportion of local administrations that have adopted and put in place local disaster risk reduction strategies, in accordance with the strategies followed at the national level

It is the ratio between the local administrations having adopted and implemented local disaster risk reduction strategies, in accordance with the strategies followed at the national level and the total number of local administrations
Percentage

Divide the number of local governments that have adopted and implemented local disaster risk reduction strategies, in accordance with nationally followed strategies by the total number of local governments, multiply by 100
Not available

11.b.2 Proportion of local administrations that have adopted and put in place local disaster risk reduction strategies, in accordance with the strategies followed at the national level

It is the ratio between the local administrations having adopted and implemented local disaster risk reduction strategies, in accordance with the strategies followed at the national level and the total number of local administrations
Percentage

Divide the number of local governments that have adopted and implemented local disaster risk reduction strategies, in accordance with nationally followed strategies by the total number of local governments, multiply by 100
Not available
